statements: SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE product_id = '654e3210-e21b-34c2-b789-426614174999' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY customer_id, quantity DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 'a51c8372-1234-5678-9876-3159c77f7381';
SELECT * FROM orders LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY quantity;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-42d3-a456-556642440000';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT oi.product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM order_items oi INNER JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id GROUP BY oi.product_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, oi.product_id, oi.quantity FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000 AND oi.quantity >= 5 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC, oi.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM OrderItems WHERE order_id = 4 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Products.product_name, Order_Items.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name, Order_Items.quantity FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 500;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Products.product_name FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, SUM(Products.price * Order_Items.quantity) AS total_price FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, SUM(item_total) AS total_amount FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.customer_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.item_total FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.order_total > 100
